name: Space Force (itch) (debatablejam)
description:
This is my first experience with game making. I'm just messing around with some different ideas. The game is split into four parts. 

1. Asteroids-like gameplay. Press space to fire. All bullets bounce off the walls and can hurt you, as well as the enemies. 

2. Maze. The deadly left side of the screen is coming! Fly through the maze at hyper-speed!

3. Bosses. Kill the two UFOs to beat the game. They leave deadly chem-trails.

4. Redemption. If you die, you have a limited amount of time to get your tail-spinning ship into the portal or game over.

Press Enter at title screen, click on the level to begin (One Small Step).

Use up to accelerate and left/right to turn. Use space bar to fire.
